text:
RELIGION

Ramayanam: Navalpakkam Narasimhan, Visranthi Mudhiyor Illam, M.G.R. Rd., Palavakkam, 3-30 p.m.

Amudhar Amudham: Venu Raza Narayanan, Sri Santhana Venugopal Perumal Thirukoil, 115, Pedariyar Koil St., Broadway, 6 p.m.

Panchadasi: Satyavratananda Saraswati, Mylapore Club, Luz Church Rd., Mylapore, 11 a.m.

GENERAL

SRM University – Ramapuram Campus: Conference on ‘Advances in Civil Engineering and Sustainable Construction – ACESC ‘1’, Ramapuram, 10 a.m.

Pan IIT Leadership Series and IIT Alumni Industry Interaction Center, Chennai: Pals Summit, IC and SR Auditorium, IIT Madras, 10 a.m.

Madras School of Social Work: 21st Mary Clubwala Jadhav endowment lecture on ‘Social Crossroads and Leadership Today’ and presentation of Mary Clubwala Jadhav award for Humanitarian Service 2016, Casa Major Rd., Egmore, 10 a.m.

D.G. Vaishnav College: College day, Arumbakkam, 4 p.m.

Alpha School – Porur: Annual day, Thandalam, Porur, 5 p.m.

Alpha School – West C.I.T. Nagar: Annual day, Narada Gana Sabha, T.T.K. Rd., 5 p.m.

YMCA Kilpauk Toastmasters Club: Meeting, Halls Rd., Kilpauk, 6-30 p.m.

Narcotics Anonymous: Meeting, Staying Clean Group, St. Lourdes Church, Don Bosco School, Perambur, 7 p.m.

Al-Anon: Meetings, Police Community Hall, Kondithope, Walltax Rd.; Shrine of Divine Mercy Church, Anna Nagar East, Near Chinthamani; St. Andrews Church, Gandhi Rd., Guduvancherry; Ambedkar Manram, Ashok Nagar; The Lady of the Light Church, Luz; Jacob MHSS., Judges Colony, Periakuppam, 7 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meetings, Loyola MHSS., United India Colony, Kodambakkam; St. Lukes Church, Anna Nagar; Anglo Indian Association, Ponniyamman Koil St., Egmore; Annai Velankanni Church, Besant Nagar; C.S.I. Good Shepherd Church, Taramani Link Rd., Velachery; Kondithope Community Centre, Police Quarters, Waltax Rd.; St. Mathias Church, Kamarajar Salai, K.K. Nagar; C.S.I. Church, Moolakadai; and The Lady of the Light Church, Luz Church Rd., Mylapore, 7 p.m.
title: Chennai today
